abstract: As a green, yet bombastic second lieutenant, I was confident I could pick out the soldiers who could be counted on when that time came. Sometimes battle teaches you that you may have overlooked some of your best soldiers.

lead_paragraph: It is a theme that has been delivered over and over - war brings out the best and worst in people. Watch any old war movie starring Lee Marvin, or read the papers from the early days of the Iraq war, and you will see deeds of valor peppered with foolish and disgraceful acts of cowardice.

headline.main: In Battle, a Soldier's Heart Is Revealed
